    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic field distribution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetisch fangen Sie Verteilung auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Distribution de champ magnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Distribuição do campo magnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distribuzione del campo magnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διανομή μαγνητικών πεδίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Distribución del campo magnético</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the distribution of magnetic fields around a loop carrying a current (top) and a bar magnet (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bar magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ferromagnetic material</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic dipoles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic force</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß die Verteilung 
von magnetischem um eine Schleife auffängt, die einen Strom 
(Oberseite) trägt und einen Stabmagneten (Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la distribution des 
champs magnétiques autour d'une boucle portant un courant (dessus) et
une barre aimantée (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a distribuição de 
campos magnéticos em torno de um laço que carrega uma corrente 
(alto) e um ímã de barra (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la distribuzione dei 
campi magnetici intorno ad un ciclo che trasporta una corrente (parte 
superiore) e un magnete di barra (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη διανομή των μαγνητικών
πεδίων γύρω από έναν βρόχο που φέρνει ένα ρεύμα (κορυφή) και 
έναν μαγνήτη ράβδων (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la distribución de 
campos magnéticos alrededor de un bucle que lleva una corriente 
(tapa) y un imán de barra (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stabmagnet</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">aktuell</string>
          </keyword>
